phrases: I walk through the white pages of my storybook
that is just waiting to be painted
with a kaleidoscope of my experiences
aa yawarakakute atatakai kimi no te
Your hand is so warm held within mine
nigiri shimete sono kokoro no oku made todoku you ni
It reaches all the way into my heart
hohoenmi de kumeta nara nigirikaeshite kuretara
I cannot see a brighter future
boku wa tada mae wo miteru
than you smiling and taking my hand as well
About what I said that day...
You do not need to worry about it.
What did he mean by that?
That what he said before was not important?
I guess he must have meant that.
I guess that much should have been obvious.
It should have been obvious, but...
I considered myself the closest to you out of all of the guys.
But that is not necessarily true.
I cannot stop thinking about what he said,
and how I should have answered him.
I should not be this upset.
It makes no sense for me to be this upset.
I am the only one who thought it meant something else...
I was only thinking of myself.
What did we have to come all the way out here to talk about?
I am finally in the same class as the popular Kazehaya.
It is only normal to want to talk to you!
What do you want me to say to that?
So how many times have you been confessed to?
Sadako's been sort of an outcast since freshmen year, has not she?
Do not you think it would be better to leave her alone?
I have heard that you cannot stop helping people like her,
but do not you think you are actually doing more harm than good?
What are you trying to say?
You call Kuronuma an outcast and then say that I cannot leave outcasts alone.
That has nothing to do with anything.
Let us see a Mr. Lively Smile!
Whatever, I do not want to hear it from you.
You should not involve yourself with her so much.
She is finally being accepted in class.
But if the girls start getting jealous of her because you pay so much attention to her,
she will become an outcast again.
That would defeat your purpose too.
You should not do that to her.
Why are you telling me that?
Even if that happened, I would take care of it!
There is a reason why I do the things I do!
the more you do, the more she will stand out as a target of jealousy.
She has all these false expectations.
Why do you feel sorry for her?
When has she ever had false expectations?
You and Sadako have wildly different expectations.
But you are not close enough to her to see that.
I cannot say any more than that.
Otherwise I would be giving away a girl's deepest secrets.
You do not want to make things difficult for her, do you?
I do not need you to tell me!
You are so popular, yet you do not have a girlfriend.
Does that mean you like someone?
You should go out with her!
Should I help you get her?
But you are not close enough to her to see that.
I am not close enough to her?
So it is like a relatives-only ceremony?
They are not even inviting their coworkers,
so I assumed that I would not be invited either.
But then Toru called me and told me that I had to go.
You are like one of the family!
But if I am going to go, I have to look good!
You will look great in that.
I went shopping and could not help myself.
I wish I could have shown Sawako too!
What kind of answer is that?
Hey, do you think Kuronuma and I are really that different?
Do I really not understand her?
No, I do not really think you do.
He does not even know that Sawako likes him!
Why are you asking all of a sudden?
Just something someone said to me.
I did not think that at all.
I actually thought I understood her better than just about everyone.
Like, people have had the wrong idea about Yano-chin and I before.
We have dealt with our share of gossip and lies,
but maybe not as much as Sawako has.
He is always been fourth to bat... always the clean up guy, right?
The upperclassmen on the team are really tough on him sometimes.
In that respect, in terms of experience, you are probably the most different from her.
Did something happen with him and Sawako?
Wow, Sawako ran a review session?
Yeah, supposedly she was really good at explaining things!
It is just like Kazehaya to plan something like that.
That loud, flamboyant guy did it!
Yeah, Kent supposedly volunteered her for it right in the middle of class!
Do not over think, do not over think!
This is how it used to be.
It used to be like this, but...
Just now, I kind of felt like he was avoiding me.
What did you and Kazehaya talk about yesterday that made things today so awkward?!
If anyone else saw this, they would definitely think Sawako's being bullied.
So basically, you spoke with him twice, and the first time...
I considered myself the closest to you out of all of the guys.
Forget about what I said that day.
And the second was like that.
Why did you give chocolates to everyone but him?
That was such a good chance!
You two even went to the shrine together on New Year's!
You could have just said it was in thanks, like you always do!
He gave you his contact info, did not he?
It is not that hard to meet up with him!
Any excuse to do it would have worked!
I just do not know what to do anymore.
I could not bring myself to give him chocolates just in thanks.
I cannot bring myself to contact him either.
I am so nervous when I am around him that I cannot even greet him.
I do not want him to hate me.
I cannot stop myself from being selfish.
You are not the only one who is scared.
Sawako, would you really like things to stay the way they are now?
If you decide not to do anything just because you are scared, things will stay this way forever.
If you do not want that, then you need to do something about it.
It is not something that you can do in an instant.
So just calm down and think about it for a bit.
Whoever's on duty today for year 2 class D, report to the office immediately!
I did not know what we were going to do when Sawako started crying.
But you knew exactly what to say.
Then make it seem like you are not!
She is used to people avoiding her so stop giving her reason to suspect it.
Everyone just keeps saying whatever they please!
You seem to be in a pretty bad mood.
I just felt kind of bad for Kazehaya too.
Why do you feel bad for Kazehaya?
I mean, the girl he likes acts like she is super scared of him...
But Yano-chin, Kazehaya cares about Sawako too!
That is what I have been saying!
Then this is great, is not it?
Do you think Kazehaya's the type who likes people interfering in his business?
Hey Kazehaya, Eri says she likes you.
Are you making fun of me?
Then why are you the one telling me and not her?
If we tell Kazehaya and he thinks she asked us to do it, it will make things worse for her!
We can tell Sawako and get her to confess to Kazehaya!
If we tell Sawako and force her to confess, they might start going out.
But would that really be for the best?
If Sawako's still afraid of him?
They would be a couple in name only.
Their actual situation would not change.
I do not want Sawako to date him while still feeling inferior to him.
I want her to come up with the strength to confess to him on her own.
It would be wrong for her to feel like he is just dating her out of pity or kindness.
Now that I think about it, even if we did tell Sawako, she probably would not believe us.
You guys are so nice to me!
No, I do not really think you understand her.
You are probably the most different from her.
I am the one who did not understand.
You were saying something about Kazehaya?
If I do not fix this, Yano-chin'll kill me!
You went to the cursed review session?
Losing five kilograms in three days!
Will you hold one today too?
You have got to be more confident!
Oh no, do not thank me!
Where did you get that plant from?
That is a medicinal herb I am growing in the garden.
You really helped me back there.
douka i am about to dake wa furimukanaide
Please do not look at me right now
The sun's set, the wind's blowing,
and we are so close that we can almost touch
My gaze has always been fixed on you
I do not mind if this emotion is what they call love,
and I do not care if I get hurt by it
I just want to tell you, over and over again
He is the one person whose eyes I can never meet.
Next time: The Person I Like.
